quickstart.become_master: Become a master and get our diving suit!
quickstart.complete_steps: Complete the steps bellow to take full advantage of Nuclia’s features and get for free our official diving suit.
quickstart.task1.title: Sign Up
quickstart.task2.title: First .pdf Upload
quickstart.task3.title: Watch tutorial video
quickstart.task4.description:
Use the “Content Options” in the menu to upload:
• 1 document (word of PDF)
• 1 media file (audio or video) in english, spanish, french, german, catalan or italian
• 1 link
quickstart.task4.title: Upload 3 files (1 minutes)
quickstart.task5.description:
Check the processing status of your files.
Once your files are processed use the search bar to make 3 searches.
Discover how Nuclia extracts knowledge from your files.
quickstart.task5.title: Make 3 searches (2 minutes)
quickstart.task6.description: Use your API Key to make 3 queries to the API.
quickstart.task6.title: Make 3 API Calls (2 minutes)
quickstart.task7.description: Let a developer know about Nuclia
quickstart.task7.title: Spread the word
quickstart.title: Quick start

stash.settings.processes.classifier.info: In order to do accurate label search suggestions, existing contents have to be labelled. As more contents are labelled, better will be the training. You can create new labels and classifications in the ontology page.
stash.settings.processes.labeller.info: In order to label automatically sentences, paragraph or resources; existing contents have to be labelled. As more contents are labelled, better will be the training. You can create new labels and classifications in the ontology page.
stash.settings.processes.training.active: There is an active training that you can stop at any time. You will receive an email when it is complete.
stash.settings.processes.training.agreem: I accept the consumption of the required hours
stash.settings.processes.training.not-al: The training feature is not available on basic accounts.
stash.settings.processes.training.time_r: The time required to train is about {{hours}} hours which will be subtracted from the available hours.
stash.title: Title of the box
stash.top_insights_description: Please, select the 4 essential insights you would like have in the filters menu.
stash.upload_to_search: Upload data to start using the AI-search engine.

stash.valid_emails: Add, separated by comas, the emails addresses from witch emails will be accepted.

stats.total.title: Total number of resources
tasks.credits.title: Available cycles
tour.step1.content: But with just some steps, you’ll learn how Nuclia works, so you can start supercharging your application!
tour.step1.title: No one likes a product tour, we know!
tour.step10.title: API Keys
tour.step11.content: Complete all the tasks and get a super cool t-shirt!
tour.step11.title: Become a Master
tour.step2.content: Nuclia’s engine suggests entities, semantic results, specific paragraphs and even classifications. Suggestions will help you to get even more specific results.
tour.step2.title: Find & discover
tour.step3.content: Use the filter tab to find even more specific results.  Use it to find data without utilizing the search bar.
tour.step3.title: Filter search results (coming soon!)
tour.step4.content: Manage your profile and account preferences. Create, edit or delete knowledge boxes.
tour.step4.title: User & Account preferences
tour.step5.title: Content options
tour.step6.content: Check if information is fully processed. Delete files. Create classifications and navigate the content using name entities.
tour.step6.title: Content management and entity discovering
tour.step7.content: Train specific-domain AI models on your knowledge box. Upload your own entities.
tour.step7.title: Training
tour.step8.content: Create and personalize your search widget to be embedded in any application.
tour.step8.title: Widget
tour.step9.content: Manage what users can access the Knowledge Box.
tour.step9.title: Users management
upload.audios_detected: We detected audio files. To continue, select the file and its language.
upload.invalid_image: Selected file is not a valid image
upload.once_uploaded: Once uploaded, you can see the status from the resource list page. When the resource status is green, you can search for and view it.
upload.select_file: Drop your files here or click here
upload.size_warning_1: Media files can not exceed {{ maxMedia }} and non media files {{ max }}.
upload.size_warning_2: The files that exceed that weight will not be upload
upload.takes_time: Nuclia needs some time to process the files. You can close this dialog box and keep working.

validation.url_required: Enter a valid URL (for example https://nuclia.com)
